original_title: Steps taken to import fertilizers required for upcoming season
original_body_lines: The National Fertilizer Secretariat says that steps have been taken to import fertilizers for the upcoming cultivation season.
Its director Mr. Chandana Mutuhewage mentioned that necessary measures are being taken for the import of fertilizers in contact with the World Agriculture Organization.
Mr. Chandana Mutuhewage said that a consignment of fertilizer imported for the last season is still in stock.
